edu.thu.keg.mdap_impl.datafield

Class GeneralDataField

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.thu.keg.mdap_impl.datafield.GeneralDataField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataField
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ImsiField

    public class GeneralDataField
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataField
    A general implementation of the interface DataField. This class can be instantiated directly, or sub-classed to form other specific-purpose fields.
    Author:
    Yuanchao Ma
